overrides.comment: Armor (Vault 101 Suit) - Changes its base name to Vault Dweller's Uniform and removes its instance naming rules
overrides.name: Vault Dweller's Uniform

overrides.comment: Armor (Gas Mask) - Adds 35 poison resistance and removes its existing radiation resistance
Armor (X-01 Torso) - Increases its armor rating, weight, value, and health/condition
Armor (Heavy Dog Armor) - Adds 35 armor rating
